desc: It is a Dharma Shop or Buddha Store, is a Buddhist Art Gallery with several Collections as: Buddha Statues, Thangka Paintings, Buddhist Necklaces, Malas & Bracelets. You may also find Buddhist Teaching Symbols and Practice Instruments.

layout.text: We are happy to share with you our deepest aspiration, the connection with The Dharma. Our Dharma Shop has an exclusive collection of traditional Buddhist Art, made in  the Himalayas with devotion.
